headline: SVP, Director of Risk Modeling at Citi
about:
20+ years of successful risk management, quantitative analytics, origination pricing, risk modeling, AI/Machine Learning, strategic planning, loan quality forecasting, statistical model development and 30+ years of Monte Carlo modeling, simulation and optimization.

Proven leadership and Expert in Credit Risk /Market Risk/Operational Risk Analytics (Loss Forecasting, Risk Appetite/Risk Dashboard, Portfolio Analysis, Portfolio Optimization, Commercial(Wholesale)/Retail(consumer such as Mortgage, Credit Card ) Credit Risk/Counterparty Credit Risk, PPNR, Liquidation Stress Testing (LST), Credit Economic Capital Allocation, AIRB System, Operational Risk.

Proven leadership and Expert in managing enterprise wide projects such as Enterprise Risk Management, RAROC system, XVA (CVA, DVA), Operational Risk, and Enterprise Model Risk Management Policy, Enterprise Model Inventory Management and Governance Control.

Proven leadership in managing highly technical staffs with most holding PhDs to deliver great results for business decision-making. Well-developed management, analytical, Senior Management & Board Reporting, and interaction with the Regulators. Customer focused and results oriented.
Enterprise Stress Testing (SCAP/CCAR/DFAST) and Current Expected Credit Losses (CECL) Methodology

Specialties: PD/LGD/EAD/RC with AIRB Approach
Risk Attributes Analysis
Big Data Analytics
Economic Capital Allocation and Optimization
Credit Portfolio Management / Credit Strategy
Risk Appetite/Risk Dashboard
Enterprise Stress Testing (SCAP/CCAR/DFAST & ICCAP)
Current Expected Credit Losses (CECL) Methodology
Credit Risk Model Design, Framework for Both Commercial & Consumer portfolios
Operational Risk Management and Quantitative Analysis
Enterprise Model Risk Management Policy, Enterprise Model Inventory Management and Governance Control.
Machine Learning(ML) and AI
Show less

headline: 📌 Executive Career Management Coach ➜ Recruiter ●Resume Writer ●LinkedIn NCOPE Trainer/Strategist ●Interview Coach ●Career Keynote Speaker ➜ Empowering People to Reach Career Happiness 📌 I've Been Told I'm a Nice Guy!
about:
𝗔𝗥𝗘 𝗬𝗢𝗨 𝗥𝗘𝗔𝗗𝗬 𝗙𝗢𝗥 𝗧𝗛𝗘 𝗧𝗥𝗨𝗧𝗛?
✅ Currently, it's a highly competitive job market. Many companies have been restructuring over the past 10 months, and the new government administration has also been restructuring agencies. We will get past this; we can help you with the right strategies to impact how we emerge from this crisis and catapult you into your next career target.

It’s not a job search anymore; it’s a Career Marketing Campaign (CMC). Are you marketing yourself?

▶️ 𝗜𝗡 𝗧𝗢𝗗𝗔𝗬'𝗦 𝗖𝗢𝗠𝗣𝗘𝗧𝗜𝗧𝗜𝗩𝗘 𝗝𝗢𝗕 𝗠𝗔𝗥𝗞𝗘𝗧 𝗬𝗢𝗨 𝗡𝗘𝗘𝗗 𝗧𝗢:
● Increase your "Connectivity" to career or business opportunities through networking,
● Create powerful career marketing documents (resumes, bios, cover letters, etc.) that target your next move, highlight your value, and ignite your self-confidence.
● Your resume and LinkedIn must be rich and dense in relevant keywords for your career target.
● Build a cohesive, professional brand so that a busy hiring manager can quickly understand your value in what you do, how you do it, and what you stand for.
● Design your LinkedIn profile to stand out, attract key decision-makers, and encourage professional networking.
● Write Applicant Tracking Software (ATS) friendly documents that get scored correctly.
● Use proven job search techniques that can connect you with more opportunities, help tap into the hidden job market, and assist in landing more job interviews.
● Improve your interviewing skills through one-on-one mock interviews to help turn job interviews into job offers.
● Provide clarity and direction to your job search or career transition.

𝙎𝙘𝙝𝙚𝙙𝙪𝙡𝙚 𝙖 𝘾𝙤𝙢𝙥𝙡𝙞𝙢𝙚𝙣𝙩𝙖𝙧𝙮 𝙍𝙚𝙨𝙪𝙢𝙚/𝙇𝙞𝙣𝙠𝙚𝙙𝙄𝙣 𝙧𝙚𝙫𝙞𝙚𝙬 - 𝙫𝙞𝙨𝙞𝙩 𝙢𝙮 𝙤𝙥𝙚𝙣 𝙘𝙖𝙡𝙚𝙣𝙙𝙖𝙧 𝙡𝙞𝙣𝙠 on my introduction card under my name.

▶️ 𝗪𝗛𝗔𝗧 𝗜 𝗗𝗢 𝗔𝗡𝗗 𝗪𝗛𝗬
✅ I bring clarity to today's career campaigns & empower you with the tools to hit your career target.
✅ After dedicating decades to driving growth for various companies, I decided to create a business where I could positively impact people's lives by inspiring career success.
✅ I'm driven by providing people with knowledge, truth, inspiration, and confidence to motivate them to take action and advance their futures and careers.


My role at The National Resume Writers' Association as Director of Member Support and NCOPE Certification Instructor underscores my commitment to professional development within the industry.
Show less
